thread.section_title: KISA phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Paul Stichel
thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by Paul Stichel

author: Paul Stichel
title: Paul Stichel
text:
I think the concept of the phone is fantastic as it allows the elderly operator the security of knowing help is only a press of a button away with the additional benefit of others being able to make contact via this phone.
My only concern is that I have received numerous phone calls from the user who has unintentionally leaned or knocked the phone whilst being worn around the neck and therefore has activated the phone. I am not sure how this can be rectified perhaps the research and development section needs to address this.
I would like some feedback on this!
